rls_policies.policy_name: Allow authenticated users full access to faturas_vendedor

database_structure.table_description: VAT exceptions table - stores custom VAT rates for specific suppliers from listagem_compras

columns.description: Supplier name (matches nome_fornecedor from listagem_compras)
VAT rate as percentage (e.g., 10 for 10%)
Whether this VAT exception is currently active
Optional notes about this VAT exception

Allow authenticated users full access to ne_fornecedor

database_structure.table_description: Palette management table for tracking palettes with sequential numbering

columns.description: Primary key - UUID
Sequential palette number (P1, P2, P3...) - auto-generated
Foreign key to fornecedores table - supplier information
Supplier guide number - reference from supplier documentation
Reference from materiais.referencia - material reference code
Quantity per palette from materiais.qt_palete - can be manually overridden
Date of palette creation/registration - defaults to current date
Foreign key to profiles table - who created this palette
Timestamp when record was created
Timestamp when record was last updated - auto-updated on changes

rls_policies.policy_name: Allow admin full access to paletes
rls_policies.using_expression:
(EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM (profiles p
     JOIN roles r ON ((p.role_id = r.id)))
  WHERE ((p.user_id = auth.uid()) AND ((r.name)::text = ANY ((ARRAY['admin'::character varying, 'Admin'::character varying, 'ADMIN'::character varying])::text[])))))
rls_policies.with_check_expression:
(EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM (profiles p
     JOIN roles r ON ((p.role_id = r.id)))
  WHERE ((p.user_id = auth.uid()) AND ((r.name)::text = ANY ((ARRAY['admin'::character varying, 'Admin'::character varying, 'ADMIN'::character varying])::text[])))))
